content:
saulecabrera opened PR #6554 from saulecabrera:winch-control-flow-block to bytecodealliance:main:

This commit is a follow-up to
https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/pull/6550.

This change implements support for blocks.

I'll leave it as draft until the base PR lands.

  • Explain why this change is needed. If the details are in an issue already,
    this can be brief.

Our development process is documented in the Wasmtime book:
